title: cmd/gc: unhelpful error message when using defer or go with type conversion
body:
Using defer or go on a type conversion yields an unhelpful error such as `0 not used`
for `defer int(0)`

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. http://play.golang.org/p/bw-7GRpLlD

What is the expected output?
A more helpful message, stating that using a type conversion doesn't make sense here

What do you see instead?
An imprecise error that's neither including the complete wrong input nor a useful hint

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version devel +88ae367d61aa Sun Dec 30 12:01:53 2012 -0500 linux/amd64
